title: Apply for a Virginia Escort Vehicle Driver Certification
text_content:
Eligibility
As of 2014, Virginia law requires individuals wanting to perform the duties of an escort vehicle driver to complete an escort vehicle driver training course. Successful completion of this training course is required before taking an escort vehicle driver certification knowledge test at any Virginia DMV customer service center.
To qualify for Virginia escort vehicle driver certification, you must:
Be at least 18 years of age
Hold a valid driver's license
Successfully complete an 8-hour escort vehicle driver certification training course approved by Virginia DMV
How to Apply
To apply for Virginia escort vehicle driver certification, you must:
Submit a completed Escort Vehicle Driver Certification Application (
HP 404
) to any Virginia DMV
customer service center
Pass an escort vehicle driver certification knowledge test with a score of 80% or higher
Pay a $25 certification fee
The Virginia Escort Driver's Manual (
HP 405
) will assist in your preparation for the test. An appointment is not necessary.
Fees
The fee for an original or renewal escort vehicle driver certification is $25. Certifications are valid for 5 years.
The fee for a duplicate or reissue escort vehicle driver certification is $15.
